column1: roy-bicknell-a1947835,Roy,Bicknell,I help finance & other business professionals communicate confidently and effectively in English | Highly experienced English Language Trainer | International Speaker & Presenter | Professional writer,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQGJXD4IpCENdg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1516586712833?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=BI39UTO5w-K2u8MzAertMGEdJVBO9Yp7z9DAoFN77XU,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D16AQGqYM1mNwMM9Q/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1614684216852?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=x7rQ1zR7rgMvv1kHXGHrb3DpoRbqDIh3nTHD9o1n6vs,personal,ACoAAAddsrUB3UTD3yvOLy9Nh4v9_cVYMiTJKFU,123581109,,"Do you want to take your career to the next level? I am an ELT trainer based in the Netherlands with a proven track record of more than 25 years of experience working in the field of business English.

Business communication has seen a major shift towards more public speaking in English. Are you lacking confidence as a presenter and wish to upgrade your skills? As an experienced international presenter, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you are looking for.
I offer a short tailored 1-on-1 course. You will learn how to:

column2: Engage the audience through your story
Stay on focus with your message
Give a flexible and appropriate response to audience questions

column1: The tailored course is three sessions of one hour with additional activities to support your development. You will also have email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 360.

As a professional you need to be a natural and fluent communicator in a broad and diverse range of business situations. As an experienced specialist in business English, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you are looking for.
I offer 1-on-1 or group courses where you will learn how to:

column2: Stay on point with your message
Be timely and appropriate in your response
Show confidence and flexibility in your English
Adjust and respond adequately in unexpected situations

column1: The tailored 1-on-1 course has a pre-course assessment and includes ten sessions of one hour with additional activities to support your development. You will also have email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 999.

The group course has a maximum of 6 participants. It has a pre-course assessment and ten sessions of one hour, with additional group activities and weekly email feedback and tips for the duration of the course. Your investment is € 490.
Interested? Message me here for a free initial consultation.

As an experienced international presenter, I can provide the tutoring and feedback you need to become more effective in your presentations. Learn how to:

· Engage the audience through your story

· Improvise in response to unexpected questions
